name: Enneacraft Release
effectText: Place 1 "Enneacraft" Pendulum Monster from your Deck in your Pendulum Zone. If this card is in your GY, except the turn it was sent there: You can banish it; add 1 face-up "Enneacraft" monster from your Extra Deck to your hand. You can only activate 1 "Enneacraft Release" per turn.
